verses.verse: The <S%G4245>elder,<s%> to the <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G2959>lady<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3441>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> those who <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth;<s%>

<S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>

I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G3029>greatly<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> we have <S%G2983>been<s%> <S%G1785>commanded<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>Now<s%> I <S%G2065>beg<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> dear <S%G2959>lady,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> though I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G2443>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> that you should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4108>deceivers<s%> have gone <S%G1525>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> those who <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3670>confess<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4108>deceiver<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G500>Antichrist.<s%>

<S%G991>Watch<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G622>lose<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G2038>accomplished,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that we <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G3408>a<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> <S%G3408>reward.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3845>transgresses<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>doesn't<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> He who <S%G3306>remains<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G5547><s%> the same <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1014>want<s%> to do so <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G5489>paper<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3188>ink,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4750>face<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4750>face,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> may <S%G5600>be<s%> made <S%G4137>full.<s%>
